title: (x) The Larsen Effect book cover - custom drawn {Louise Døssing (self)}
content:
I'm looking for the font used by mevis en van deursen for the cover of the book "the larsen effect"   
Do you know it?   
   
 ![larsen](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054908im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69453.jpg)
author: louise

comments.content:
I found out that they drew the font themselves.   
so...

Do any of you know a font that's similar, not connected?   
   
like handel or metro gothic?   
   
louise

How about [Bayer Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054908/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/victory/bayer-sans/) from Victory Type?   
   
You can search on 'unicase' to try to find others.

Oh, And, If you like 'Handel', you may love ' [Simian](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054908/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=24&subpage=viewfonts)' _( [Orangutan](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054908/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=24&subpage=viewfonts) )_, from House Industries..

Thank you. The unicase searchword was at great help!   
   
I have found the font gala   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/gala/regular/charmap.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054908/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/gala/regular/charmap.html)   
   
which is similar. The � sign is used as t   
   
very nice!   
   
also labtob unicase   
 [http://www.themeworld.com/fonts/plainsan3.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054908/http:/www.themeworld.com/fonts/plainsan3.shtml)   
   
louise
